DefaultReaderConfiguration.preQueryCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SDKEventView WHERE SDKEventView.TimeStored > ?
DefaultReaderConfiguration.queryString: SELECT sdkev.TimeStored AS AlertTime, sdkev.TimeGenerated, sdkev.NTEventID, sdkev.Source, sdkev.Message, sdkev.ComputerName, sdkev.UserName, sdkev.ComputerDomain FROM SDKEventView sdkev WHERE sdkev.TimeStored > ? AND (sdkev.Source = 'FCSAM' OR sdkev.Source = 'FcsSas' OR sdkev.Source = 'FcsMs' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSCAMRtp' OR sdkev.Source = 'Microsoft Forefront Client Security' OR sdkev.Source = 'Microsoft Forefront Security' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSCRealtimeScanner' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSCManualScannner' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSCController' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSCMonitor' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSCStatisticsServer' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSCTransportScanner' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSECCRService' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSEIMC' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSEMailPickup' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSEStore' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSOCScanner' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSOCEventSink' OR sdkev.Source = 'FSSPController' OR sdkev.Source = 'GetEngineFiles') ORDER BY sdkev.TimeStored;

string.toolTipText: Enter the Forefront server's hostname to read from.
Enter the AVG server's instance name to read from (if the Forefront database is on an instance).
Enter the Forefront server's port number.
Enter the Forefront server's database protocol.
Enter the number of seconds between queries.
JDBC Driver class for Forefront Database
Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data.

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data.

select.toolTipText: The data output this reader feeds.

FastPattern.matcher: ([^\t]+)\t([^\t]+)\t[^\t]+\t([^\t]+)\t([^\t]+)\t\s*(.*?) [\\\s]*Current Signature Version:\s*(.*?) [\\\s]*Previous Signature Version:\s*(.*?) [\\\s]*Update Source:.*?Signature Type:\s*(.*?) [\\\s]*Update Type:.*?User:.*?Current Engine Version:.*?Previous Engine Version:\s+[^\t]+\s\t([^\t]+)\t[^\t]+\t[^\t]+.*

([^\t]+)\t([^\t]+)\t[^\t]+\t([^\t]+)\t([^\t]+)\t\s*(.*?) [\\\s]*Signatures Attempted:\s*(.*?) [\\\s]*Error Code:\s*(.*?) [\\\s]*Error description:\s*(.*?) [\\\s]*Signatures loading:\s*(.*?) [\\\s]*Loading signature version:\s*(.*?) [\\\s]*.*?Loading engine version:\s+([^\t]+)\t([^\t]+)\t[^\t]+\t[^\t]+.*
